org.esupportail.commons.services.cas
Interface CasService

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCasService, PortletCasServiceImpl, ServletCasServiceImpl
public interface CasService
extends java.io.Serializable

The interface of the CAS service used to retrieve PTs from the CAs server.

                                throws CasException
Parameters:
targetService - The service the PT should be sent to.
Returns:
a PT.
Throws:
CasException

validate

void validate()
              throws CasException
validate the ticket (ST or PT) to get a PGT. This method is automatically called when retrieving the first PT for a remote service, but it can be called manually to prevent from the peremption of the ticket passed to the application.

Throws:
CasException
